articles.content: As promised, Microsoft showcased a variety of Xbox Series X games during its latest Inside Xbox stream. One of the more intriguing titles highlighted during the presentation is The Medium, a new psychological horror game from Blair Witch and Observer develope… [+1063 chars]

articles.title: Tom Cruise is eager to get back to Venice to finish filming Mission: Impossible 7 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 57-year-old is said to be champing at the bit to return to the set in Italy after the pandemic put an abrupt stop to production.
articles.content:
Tom Cruise is eager to get back to Venice to finish filming Mission: Impossible 7 as soon as coronavirus restrictions ease, according to reports.
The 57-year-old is said to be champing at the bit to return to the set in Italy after the pandemic put an abrupt… [+2297 chars]

articles.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: every improvement we want to see when it comes to Xbox Series X - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Our Assassin's Creed expert is here to run down everything she wants to see improved when Valhalla finally comes to Xbox Series X.
articles.content: Assassins Creed Odyssey is one of my all-time favourite games - for its in-depth exploration of Ancient Greek mythology and culture, for its incredibly beautiful game world, and for the gameplay itself. Ive lost hundreds of hours to it, and Ill probably be sh… [+8883 chars]

articles.description: THE Apex Legends Season 5 release date has been scheduled for this week, and we now know more about Respawn Entertainment's start plans for the Battle Pass.

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.title: Sony's PlayStation Store has been suspended in mainland China - Eurogamer.net
articles.content:
The PlayStation Store has been suspended in mainland China.
Right now there's no confirmation on why the Store has been taken offline, although the official word from the Chinese PlayStation Weibo account is that it's been taken down for a security upgrade. … [+1505 chars]

articles.title: Sonos reveals all-new Arc soundbar...and that's not all that has changed - Express
articles.description: SONOS ARC is the latest soundbar from smart speaker brand Sonos. The new device gets a fresh look and a massive audio upgrade ...and it's not the only new addition to the range. Here is everything that's new.
